name: Air Defence
overview: Play the role of 'Commander of Air Defences' in AIR DEFENCE. You have 10 squadrons of fighters, 2 squadrons of Early Warning Aircraft (AEW) and 2 squadrons of Flight Refueling Tanker Aircraft (AAR). Your objective is to fend off and destroy the waves of enemy aircraft that are trying to destroy your industries, radar, ships, airfields and your Headquarters. Beware of the enemy squadrons that have heavy fighter escorts! There are 5 levels of difficulty.
